TextLibrary.Text: Ahhh... I know you. You released our brother, Lord Moarg, in the Borderlands.
Ahhh... I know you. You released our brother, Lord Moarg, in the Borderlands.
Ahhh... I know you. You released our brother, Lord Moarg, in the Borderlands.
Ahhh... I know you. You released our brother, Lord Moarg, in the Borderlands.
I had my reasons for releasing Moarg. I don't have any reason for releasing YOU!
I had my reasons for releasing Moarg. I don't have any reason for releasing YOU!
